article.title: 90 Recommended Journals for the Hospital's Health Science Library
article.author: Yast, H.T.
article.text: Choosing from the growing number of medical and paramedical journals is becoming increasingly difficult for the health science librarian, the author states. She describes a survey of librarians and directors of medical education to obtain recommendations on titles to form a core journal collection and lists in order of preference the 90 top-ranking titles.
